value="adult"/> <xs:enumeration value="child"/> <xs:enumeration value="infant without a seat"/> <xs:enumeration value="infant with a seat"/> <xs:enumeration value="unaccompanied child"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="passenger-number" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:integer"> <xs:minInclusive value="1"/> <xs:maxInclusive value="10"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="connecting-cities" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> name="flights"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="flight"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="price" type="xs:decimal"/> <xs:element name="addresses"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="starting-city" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="destination" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> disscount--> <xs:element name="guest-reservation-type" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="leisure"/> <xs:enumeration value="corporate"/> <!--include desscount--> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <!--rent from to--> <xs:element name="period" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:complexType> <xs:all> <xs:element name="rent"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:dateTime"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="return"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:dateTime"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:all> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="travel-distance-type" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> value="BMW"/> <xs:enumeration value="Ferrari"/> <xs:enumeration value="Ford"/> <xs:enumeration value="KIA"/> <xs:enumeration value="Jeep"/> <xs:enumeration value="Audi"/> <xs:enumeration value="Honda"/> <xs:enumeration value="Mercedes-Benz"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="special-equipment" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="car"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="price" type="xs:double"/> <xs:element name="rate-code" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="promotional-description" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="guest-reservation-type" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration name="username" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="passport-number" type="xs:long" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="price" type="xs:double" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="rate-code" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="promotional-description" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <!--consider as disscount--> <xs:element name="guest-reservation-type" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="leisure"/> <xs:enumeration value="corporate"/> <!--include desscount--> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <!--rent from to--> <xs:element name="period" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:complexType> <xs:all> <xs:element name="rent"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:dateTime"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="return"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:dateTime"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:all> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="travel-distance-type" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="limited"/> <xs:enumeration value="unlimited"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="passenger-number" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:integer"> <xs:minInclusive value="1"/> <xs:maxInclusive value="4"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="preferences" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="car-type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Tesla"/> <xs:enumeration value="BMW"/> <xs:enumeration value="Ferrari"/> <xs:enumeration value="Ford"/> <xs:enumeration value="KIA"/> <xs:enumeration value="Jeep"/> <xs:enumeration value="Audi"/> <xs:enumeration value="Honda"/> <xs:enumeration value="Mercedes-Benz"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="special-equipment" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Child Safety Seats"/> <xs:enumeration value="GPS units"/> <xs:enumeration value="Mobility devices"/> <xs:enumeration value="Ski racks"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="cars"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="car"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="price" type="xs:double"/> <xs:element name="rate-code" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="promotional-description" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="guest-reservation-type" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="leisure"/> <xs:enumeration value="corporate"/> <!--include desscount--> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <!--rent from to--> <xs:element name="period" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:complexType> <xs:all> <xs:element name="rent"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:dateTime"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="return"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:dateTime"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:all> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="travel-distance-type" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="limited"/> <xs:enumeration value="unlimited"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="passenger-number" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:integer"> <xs:minInclusive value="1"/> <xs:maxInclusive value="4"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="preferences"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="car-type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Tesla"/> <xs:enumeration value="BMW"/> <xs:enumeration value="Ferrari"/> <xs:enumeration value="Ford"/> <xs:enumeration value="KIA"/> <xs:enumeration value="Jeep"/> <xs:enumeration value="Audi"/> <xs:enumeration value="Honda"/> <xs:enumeration value="Mercedes-Benz"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="special-equipments"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="4" name="equipment"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Child Safety Seats"/> <xs:enumeration value="GPS units"/> <xs:enumeration value="Mobility devices"/> <xs:enumeration value="Ski racks"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:schema> </xsd:types> <message name="carRentalRequest"> <part name="param" type="xsd:car-rental-request"/> </message> <message name="cars-list"> <part name="result" type="xsd:cars"/> </message> <portType name="rent-cars"> <operation name="rent-car"> <input message="tns:carRentalRequest"/> </operation> </portType> <portType name="cars"> <operation name="cars"> <input message="tns:carRentalRequest"/> <output message="tns:cars-list"/> </operation> </portType> <binding name="rentCarSOAP" type="tns:rent-cars"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <operation name="rent-car"> <soap:operation soapAction="rent-car" style="document"/> <input> <soap:body encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" namespace="urn:examples:carRentingService" use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" namespace="urn:examples:carRentingService" use="literal"/> </output> </operation> </binding> <binding name="getCarsSOAP" type="tns:cars"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <operation name="cars"> <soap:operation soapAction="cars" style="document"/> <input> <soap:body encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" namespace="urn:examples:carRentingService" use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body
